title: FS:  T206 SGC 60 Waddell / Crawford / Bender
author: becollie

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 SGC 60 Waddell / Crawford / Bender
posts.post_content:
Have the following three for sale ...  

Crawford Batting - $320
Waddell Throwing - $400
Bender No Trees - $320

I took a quick look at Card Target and tried to price in line with recent sales.

Please email me at [url]collie.brian@bcg.com[/url] if interested.

Thanks so much.

Brian

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=155651&d=1407363634[/IMG]

Well ... looks like this is a good lesson on the importance of a good scanner when looking to sell.  I assure you that the cards do not have any paper loss as it might look on the scans ... just reflections from the flash, etc.

Needless to say, feel free to make me an offer ... 

Waddell - 400
Bender - 320
Crawford - 320

Thanks,

Brian

Please feel free to make an offer ... Cards are much better than scans portray.  Would prefer to sell here vs eBay.  Looking to move soon.

Thanks
